name: Almond Joy® Cookies
author: Judi
summary: These cookies are super moist and chewy. Everyone will love them and they are so easy to make!
directions: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Combine flour, baking soda, and salt in a bowl
Beat white sugar, brown sugar, and banana together in a separate bowl until smooth and creamy; beat in eggs, 1 at a time, until well mixed
Stir banana mixture into flour mixture until batter is well mixed; fold in chocolate chips, coconut, and almonds
Drop batter by rounded spoonfuls onto the prepared baking sheets
Bake in the preheated oven until edges of cookies are beginning to crisp, 8 to 10 minutes
Cool cookies on baking sheet for 5 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely
